page.title: 16CHURCHES AND CLUBS
page.content: THE{METHODIST CHURCH, }EAST MAIN ST HAS 150 COMMUNICANTS & 330 COMMUNITY MEMBERS & SERVICES AT 11.30 AM. & 6.15 PM. THESE ORGANISATIONS USE THE CHURCH HALL:WOMANS FELLOWSHIP, YOUTH CLUB, BADMINTON CLUB, BOYS BRIGADE, BROWNIES & GIRL GUIDES. {ST ANTHONY'S CATHOLIC CHURCH,} WOTHERSPOON CRESCENT HAS 1250 MEMBERS & SERVICES ON SUNDAY 9. AM, 11.30 AM & 6. AM.WEEK DAY SERVICES ARE AT 9.30 AM.ORGANISATIONS USING THE CHURCH HALL ARE WOMANS GUILD ,CATHOLIC MOTHERS UNION, ST VINCENT DE PAUL SOCIETY, PARISH COMMITTEE, ALTER BOYS SOCIETY & GIRL GUIDES. {ARMADALE PARISH CHURCH,}ACADEMY ST HAS 950 MEMBERS & A SUNDAY SERVICE AT 11.30 AM.ORGANISATIONS ARE SUNDAY SCHOOL,YOUTH FELLOWSHIP ETC. THE{GOSPEL HALL}IS IN SOUTH ST.
